## Running Code

#MEDIDAS DE DISPERSION

```{r}
#VARIANZA
var(data_limpia$Derivation.cohort, na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#DESVIACION ESTANDAR
sd(data_limpia$Derivation.cohort, na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#RANGO
range(data_limpia$Derivation.cohort, na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#RANGO INTERCUARTILICO 
IQR(data_limpia$Derivation.cohort, na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#MEDIDAS DE POSICION 
quantile(data_limpia$Derivation.cohort, probs = c (0.25,0.5,0.75,0.90),na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#LOS 6 PRIMEROS DE LA FILA
head(data_limpia)
```

```{r}
#RESUMEN
summary(data_limpia$Derivation.cohort)
```
